page.title: 17MY DAY
page.content: My Day As Rose Queen, by Katie Hogg. Iam Gawsworth Rose Queen 1985/1986. I had a lovely dress made by Mrs Rouse and my mum,it was made of white satin and had a large lace frill at the front.On June 8th (Fete Day)I went to the Hairdressers and had my hair done.2:00pm My princesses,Carolyn Farrish and Carol Twigg and I assembled at the Parish Hall, We got on a decorated van and drove to school.We stopped at the gate and walked across the playground and on to the stage.Joanna Hart last years queen crowned me and then I gave my speech and everyone clapped.I led off the stage and went to have tea with the other Rose Queens in the hall.I got a free catcus off Mrs Pratt.I got a necklace as a present from the P.T.A. and it had a rose on the end. _
